title: [HOLD for payment 2024-07-24] [HOLD for payment 2024-07-10] [$250] Split - Selected user is not checked and does not appear on top of the list
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Go to FAB > Split expense > Manual.
3. Enter amount > Next.
4. Search for any user.
5. Select the user.

Expected result: The user will be selected and appear on top of the list.

Actual result: None
